title: New: LENKA – Heal
body:
Love this slice of super smooth pop from Australia’s **LENKA**.

Got to be completely honest, it’s not often that an artist appears on my radar five albums into their career, but very glad that LENKA did. _Heal_, the first track lifted from her new album out later this year, is as glossy as it comes. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Love this slice of super smooth pop from Australia’s LENKA. Got to be completely honest, it’s not often that an artist appears on my radar five albums into their career, but very glad that LENKA did. Heal, the first track lifted from her new album out later this year, is as glossy as it comes. \[…\]
excerpt.short: Love this slice of super smooth pop from Australia's LENKA.
